comment: sample location index (technical) or NULL for obsolete visits
the technical sequence of all locations, put here for quick join
a lookup for one of those long concatenated text columns
GRTS address (`final`, i.e. after prior replacements) needed for retainer lookup
a link to the activity metadata, brought here via fieldworkcalendar for convenience
start of the panel activity sequence (included to keep recurrent visits unique)
link to the user who performed the visit
Free text notes from the previous visits
an optional photo of the site or noteworthy thing
link to the LIMS system via recipient code
filter column for locations which have already been visited
